description: This file defines an interface class IOmiProxy that provides methods for managing crypted bundles and handling error listeners via callbacks in an OCI container environment.

classes.name: omi::IOmiProxy
classes.description: An interface class for interacting with an omi_dbus_api, including mounting/unmounting crypted bundles and managing error listeners.

methods.name: mountCryptedBundle
methods.description: Mounts a crypted bundle given its container ID and file paths, returning the bundle path if successful.

methods.name: umountCryptedBundle
methods.description: Unmounts a crypted bundle identified by its container ID.

methods.name: registerListener
methods.description: Registers an error listener callback and returns a listener ID.

methods.name: unregisterListener
methods.description: Unregisters a previously registered error listener using its ID.

ctags.name: OmiErrorListener
ctags.pattern: /^    typedef std::function<void(const std::string&, ErrorType, const void*)> OmiErrorListener;$/
